learnerAdvisory.content: Watch content at a speed that ensures understanding and retention.
Follow the sequence of content as presented.
Take one course at a time instead of consuming multiple courses across multiple devices.
Participate in discussions at the Discussion Forum regularly.
Don't rush through assessments without understanding, reflecting.
Seek clarification and assistance when needed.
Allocate dedicated time for learning activities.
Use the new section Gyaan Karmayogi regularly, to go over case studies and other learning material.
Update your profile regularly if required.

surveyFormData.title: Take the iGOT Survey, help us make iGOT even better!
surveyFormData.content: Take a few minutes to complete this survey and contribute to enhancing the iGOT learning experience
